topics: Introduction to Trees: Terminology (nodes, root, parent, child, leaf, depth, height)
Types of Trees: General Trees, Binary Trees (full, complete, perfect, degenerate)
Binary Tree Traversals (BFS): Level Order Traversal
Introduction to Binary Search Trees (BST): Definition, Properties
BST Operations: Search for a node
BST Operations: Insertion of a node
BST Operations: Deletion of a node (various cases)
Introduction to Heaps: Max Heap, Min Heap
Heap Operations: Heapify, Insert, Extract Max/Min
Practice Problems: Mix of traversals, BST operations, and general tree questions
